entry.title: $2195 // HOT PRICE * 2Bed in Well Maintained Pre War Bldg + GREAT LOCATION
entry.content:
Beautiful and Nicely Renovated 2 Bed in Well Maintained Pre War Building + GREAT LOCATION

* Steps to Bedford Ave & Prospect Park * Short Walk to B/Q/2/5 Trains & Franklin Shuttle *

Contact Paulo today! 619-850-5547 - paulo@zjamarealty.com

APARTMENT FEATURES:
- Brand NEW kitchen
- Stainless Steel Appliances
- GREAT Closet Space
- Spacious Living Room
- BIG Bedrooms
- Fully Tiled Bathroom
- LOTS of Sunlight
- Just Renovated
- Heat and Hot Water Included

This Beautiful 2 BR is Conveniently Located Just Steps to All the Best Cafes, Bars, Restaurants, Health Food Stores, Trendy Shops and SO Much More Prospect Lefferts Gardens has to offer!!!

All applicants must have 700+ credit score and make 40x the rent. Guarantors accepted.

Contact Paulo today to schedule a viewing before it's gone.

Paulo
619-850-5547
paulo@zjamarealty.com
www.zjamarealty.com
